================================================================================
* INFORMATION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
TITLE                   : Mercury
FILENAME                : Mercury**.tga Mercury**.pcx
AUTHOR                  : Phillip "Killazontherun" Basil-jones
GAME                    : Quake II
TYPE                    : Sky
EMAIL ADDRESS           : pbones@quake3nation.com
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* DESCRIPTION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A dark orangeish sky.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
New sky: Yes
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* CONSTRUCTION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
BASE                    : Scratch
BUILD TIME              : About 1/2 hour
EDITOR(S) USED          : Bryce 3d, Skypaint (For testing), Wally to change the 
                          pallete for the pcx's
OTHER UTILITIES USED    : Irfanview picture viewer
KNOWN BUGS              : None
 
Rendering time          : A while.
 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* CREDITS *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Id Software             : You know who they are!
Meta-Creations          : Makers of all the Bryce's! 

Anyone else..

* COPYRIGHT / PERMISSIONS *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Authors MAY NOT use this sky as a base to build additional
skys.

This sky may not be converted, or mofified in any way without
my permission.

You can use this sky in your level without permission but you must include 
this text file with it.

You can distribute this sky as long as you keep this text file with it UNMODIFIED.
